title: GitHub Deployments
name: auth0-github-deploy
author: auth0
description: This extension gives Auth0 customers the possibility to deploy Pages, Rules and Custom Database Connections from GitHub.
uninstallConfirmMessage: Do you really want to uninstall this extension? Doing so will stop any Pages, Rules and Database Connection scripts from being deployed from GitHub to Auth0

auth0.scopes: read:tenant_settings update:tenant_settings create:clients read:clients update:clients read:client_grants create:client_grants update:client_grants read:connections update:connections read:rules create:rules update:rules delete:rules delete:clients read:resource_servers create:resource_servers update:resource_servers read:rules_configs delete:rules_configs update:rules_configs

GITHUB_REPOSITORY.description: The repository from which you want to deploy rules and database scripts

GITHUB_BRANCH.description: The branch we should monitor for commits

GITHUB_HOST.description: GitHub Enterprise host, leave empty for github.com

GITHUB_API_PATH.description: GitHub Enterprise API path prefix, leave empty for github.com

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: Your personal access token for GitHub

SLACK_INCOMING_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Webhook URL for Slack used to notify you of successful and failed deployments
